txt.en: 'If you find yourself outside the gates of Grimslade, please pick any edible roots or plants you find. Many of our townsfolk gather their food from the surrounding forest, but they say it is far too dangerous, and they go hungry.'
Éobert can be found in Grimslade near the food stores.\n\nYou should bring the roots you gathered to Éobert.
The keeper of Grimslade's food-stores is concerned about the lack of usual supplies coming in during the wartime.
'You are too kind! The townsfolk will be terribly glad to see these. A full stomach can cheer a man even on the edge of war.'

Root vegetables can be found in the woods surrounding Grimslade in the south-eastern Westfold.\n\nYou should collect root vegetables for the people of Grimslade, who fear to go into the dangerous woods themselves to look for food.
